title: Technique
lyrics:
Technique
Technique
Take the egg (egg)
Break the egg (egg)
Beat the egg (egg)

Cook the egg (egg)

It's delicious (it's delicious)

Take the garbage, pull up the garbage

It's civilised

Technique



Touch the button, turn the button

Press the button, push the button

Switch the buttons in all the buttons

Technique



Want the control, need the control

Take the control, keep the control

Keep it (just keep it)



Choose the pizza, get the pizza

Bite the pizza, chew the pizza

Swallow it, swallow it

[?] too sexy

Here's the drop, no, here's the drop

Fuck, where's the drop? Here comes the drop

Ha-ha-ha-ha! Gotcha!

In your stomach (in your stomach)

Confetti (yeah confetti!)
